trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur has received another golem repair request.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Xarhorkur at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to the golem tinkerer.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_SEQ_03<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Xarhorkur at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the golem tinkerer)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the golem tinkerer)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the golem tinkerer)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the golem tinkerer)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the golem tinkerer)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the golem tinkerer)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the golem tinkerer)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the golem tinkerer)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but could I entrust you with more golem maintenance? Though its function is restored, a construct of its age needs regular upkeep.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>In the time since your last repair, a new malfunction has arisen, and it seems more parts will need replacing.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab>Xarhorkur should have more information for you. You'll find her at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_XARHORKUR_000_004<tab>Glad you're here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The components we need are rather intricate, which is why I requested you and your deft hands for the job.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_XARHORKUR_000_005<tab>Lest you worry, I've got all the materials you need to forge them right here. Let me know if you run out!
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_XARHORKUR_000_006<tab>Lest you worry, I've got all the materials you need to construct them right here. Let me know if you run out!
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_XARHORKUR_000_007<tab>Lest you worry, I've got all the materials you need to prepare them right here. Let me know if you run out!
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_XARHORKUR_000_008<tab>Oh, and once you've finished, go ahead and take them to the tinkerer for installation.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_XARHORKUR_000_009<tab>Need more materials? ...No, evidently not. Carry on, then! The tinkerer will be glad to see you!
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_XARHORKUR_000_012<tab>Need more materials? Certainly! Here you are.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_GOLEMYOK05361_100_014<tab>Hrmmm... Perhaps I ought to fine-tune the motor component...?
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_GOLEMYOK05361_000_015<tab>Your presence is a welcome one, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var> artisan. Have you a job in need of the golem's strength?
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_GOLEMYOK05361_000_016<tab>Oh, you're a saint! With any luck, these replacement parts will stop it from making that dreadful grinding sound... The keeper will be thrilled!

TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_GOLEMYOK05361_000_017<tab>Oh, your timing couldn't be better! Whatever was causing that delayed response time, these replacement parts ought to fix it. The keeper will be thrilled!
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_GOLEMYOK05361_000_018<tab>Granted, we're still learning through trial and error at this stage, so we may have need to call upon you again, if that's all right. Many thanks!
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_VUYARGUR_000_020<tab>Once again, our golem is restored by your hand. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_VUYARGUR_000_021<tab>Doubtless you have witnessed similar constructs in the region of Yak T'el─the former guardians of the old quarries.
TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_VUYARGUR_000_022<tab>I should like to see them for myself one day, to take comfort in the unweathered vestiges of our ancestors.

TEXT_BANYOK126_05361_VUYARGUR_000_023<tab>Much like our sepulchres, the structures we build are bearers of memory. It is a golem's duty to ensure they last for generations, and ours to ensure the golems do the same.
